attributes.action: Allow freedom of speech and reverse 'hate' crime laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe people should be allowed the choice to reject beliefs and lifestyles they don't agree with, without being persecuted and being seen as 'hateful' Speaking against a certain belief or lifestyle and saying it is wrong should be allowed! This does not mean we hate THE PERSON, just their actions..Don't misunderstand me..i believe it is wrong to direct hate towards anyone(personally)
